title: Artists
resume: The original, 8-episode series by eminent theatre artists - Monika Strzępka and Paweł Demirski about what is going on behind-the-scenes of one of the muncipial theatres in Warsaw. The story also can be read as an ambiguous metaphor, where artistic problems of cultural activities and hard economic conditions meet.

The story also can be read as an ambiguous metaphor, where artistic problems of cultural activities and hard economic conditions meet.
